information:
Chris Stapleton received six nominations for the 60th Academy of Country Music Awards. His nominations are for Male Artist of the Year, Entertainer of the Year, Album of the Year, Single of the Year, Music Event of the Year (with Carly Pearce), and Visual Media of the Year. Other top nominees include Ella Langley with eight nominations, and Cody Johnson and Morgan Wallen, who are tied with seven nominations each. Lainey Wilson also received six nominations.

Chris Stapleton has a history of success at industry awards. He has won 19 ACM Awards and 19 CMA Awards throughout his career. In November 2024, at the CMA Awards, he won four awards, including single and song of the year for 'White Horse' and was named male vocalist of the year for a record-extending eighth time. In February 2025, he won his 11th career Grammy Award for Best Country Solo Performance for the song 'It Takes A Woman'.

The 60th Academy of Country Music Awards are scheduled to take place on May 8, 2025, streaming live from the Ford Center at The Star in Frisco, Texas. Reba McEntire will host the event for the 18th time. The lineup of performers announced for the ceremony includes Chris Stapleton and Dua Lipa.

forecast.no_outcome_scenario: Despite receiving six nominations, Chris Stapleton does not win in any category. Strong competition from artists like Morgan Wallen, Cody Johnson, and Lainey Wilson secures wins in all of Stapleton's nominated categories, resulting in a complete shutout for him.
forecast.yes_outcome_scenario: Leveraging his significant industry respect and recent success, Chris Stapleton wins at least one of his six nominated awards, most likely in a category like Male Artist of the Year or Album of the Year, where he has a strong historical track record.
forecast.rationale:
My forecast is based on Chris Stapleton's high number of nominations combined with his consistent history of winning major industry awards. With six nominations, he has multiple opportunities to secure a win. His track record is exceptional, with 19 previous ACM awards and recent major wins at the November 2024 CMA Awards (4 wins) and the February 2025 Grammy Awards (1 win) for the same body of work he is nominated for here. This recent success demonstrates strong current momentum and favor within the industry voting bodies, which often have overlapping membership. His nomination in Male Artist of the Year is particularly strong, as he has won the equivalent award at the CMAs a record eight times.

My probability is not higher than 92% because a shutout, while unlikely, is not impossible. The field of nominees is very strong this year, with artists like Morgan Wallen, Cody Johnson, and Lainey Wilson also having numerous nominations and significant commercial and critical success. There is always a possibility that voters will consolidate around other artists, leading to Stapleton being overlooked in all six categories.

My probability is not lower because a complete shutout of an artist of Stapleton's stature, with this many nominations and such a strong preceding awards season, would be a major statistical upset. The combination of multiple high-probability categories makes the likelihood of him winning at least one award very high.

I would increase my forecast if one of his major competitors in multiple categories faced a significant controversy before the awards. I would decrease my forecast if a credible pre-award poll of ACM voters showed a strong, unexpected consensus forming around another artist in Stapleton's key categories.

prompt:
You are a professional forecaster interviewing for a job.

Your interview question is:
Will Chris Stapleton win an award at the 60th Academy of Country Music Awards?

Question background:
The awards are scheduled to be held on May 8, 2025. Stapleton has 5 nominations.


This question's outcome will be determined by the specific criteria below. These criteria have not yet been satisfied:
This question resolves as **Yes** if Chris Stapleton wins an award at the [60th Academy of Country Music Awards](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/60th_Academy_of_Country_Music_Awards).




Your research assistant's report says:
Chris Stapleton received six nominations for the 60th Academy of Country Music Awards. His nominations are for Male Artist of the Year, Entertainer of the Year, Album of the Year, Single of the Year, Music Event of the Year (with Carly Pearce), and Visual Media of the Year. Other top nominees include Ella Langley with eight nominations, and Cody Johnson and Morgan Wallen, who are tied with seven nominations each. Lainey Wilson also received six nominations.

Chris Stapleton has a history of success at industry awards. He has won 19 ACM Awards and 19 CMA Awards throughout his career. In November 2024, at the CMA Awards, he won four awards, including single and song of the year for 'White Horse' and was named male vocalist of the year for a record-extending eighth time. In February 2025, he won his 11th career Grammy Award for Best Country Solo Performance for the song 'It Takes A Woman'.

The 60th Academy of Country Music Awards are scheduled to take place on May 8, 2025, streaming live from the Ford Center at The Star in Frisco, Texas. Reba McEntire will host the event for the 18th time. The lineup of performers announced for the ceremony includes Chris Stapleton and Dua Lipa.

Today is 2025-04-22.

Before answering you think:
(a) The time left until the outcome to the question is known.
(b) The status quo outcome if nothing changed.
(c) A brief description of a scenario that results in a No outcome.
(d) A brief description of a scenario that results in a Yes outcome.
(e) You write your rationale remembering that good forecasters put extra weight on the status quo outcome since the world changes slowly most of the time. Explain your reasoning and the evidence behind your forecast in detail. Summarise information your received from your research assistant that influences your forecast (if any). Explain why your forecast is not higher, and why it is not lower. Outline what would need to be true for you to update your forecast in either direction.
(f) The last thing you write is your final probabilistic forecast as a number between 0 and 100.

# OUTPUT SCHEMA
{
    "time_left_until_outcome_known": "string",
    "status_quo_outcome": "string",
    "no_outcome_scenario": "string",
    "yes_outcome_scenario": "string",
    "rationale": "string",
    "probability": "number" (0-100)
}
